content:
I think there might be some confusion again! You mentioned refilling Luna's bird-watching toy, but I'm not aware of any bird-watching toys that need refills. Did you mean to say that you need to replace the batteries or refill the toy with new bird-themed accessories?

If that's the case, you can try checking the manufacturer's website or the store where you purchased the toy for replacement parts or accessories. They might have options available to keep the toy fresh and exciting for Luna.

It's great that you're committed to keeping Luna engaged and occupied when you're not home. Providing mental and visual stimulation is important for cats, and it's wonderful that you're finding ways to do so!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
